meanings.definition: Without a loft or upper story.
meanings.sent1: The small cabin was loftless, with only one floor.
meanings.sent2: The loftless barn had no space for storing hay above.
meanings.sent3: The loftless treehouse was more like a groundhouse!
meanings.sent4: Her loftless dreams kept her grounded in reality.
meanings.sent5: The loftless room felt cramped and lacking in space.

meanings.definition: Lacking a sense of loftiness or grandeur.
meanings.sent1: The plain, loftless building blended in with the rest of the street.
meanings.sent2: His loftless speech was humble and relatable to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The loftless mountain seemed almost shy compared to its towering neighbors.
meanings.sent4: Her loftless attitude made her approachable and down-to-earth.
meanings.sent5: The loftless castle was more like a cozy cottage than a royal residence.
